00022 bool
00023 MMLContentHandler::startDocument() {
00024         if (debug) qDebug("\nmmlch: start doc");
00025         cur = doc;
00026         return true;

00042 bool
00043 MMLContentHandler::startElement(const QString &/*namespaceURI*/,
00044                 const QString & localName, const QString &/*qName*/,
00045                 const QXmlAttributes &atts ) {
00046         if (debug) qDebug("startElement '%s'", (const char*)localName.toUtf8());
00047         // the root element must be a 'math' element, it this is absent,
00048         // we create one
00049         if (cur == doc && localName != "math") {
00050                 MMLElement *e = doc->createElement("math");
00051                 cur->appendChild(e);
00052                 cur = e;
00053         }
00054         bool ok = false;
00055         MMLElement *e = doc->createElement(domstring(localName));
00056         if (e) {
00057                 cur->appendChild(e);
00058                 for (int i=0; e->attributesValid() && i<atts.length(); ++i) {
00059                         QString v = atts.value(i).simplified();
00060                         e->setAttribute(atts.localName(i).toUtf8(),
00061                         domstring(v));
00062                 }
00063                 if (e->attributesValid()) {
00064                         cur = e;
00065                         ok = true;
00066                 } else {
00067                         err = qstring(e->errorMsg());
00068                         cur = NULL;
00069                 }
00070         } else {
00071                 err = qstring(doc->errorMsg());
00072                 qDebug("error: %s", (const char*)err.toUtf8());
00073                 // read failed: clear all
00074                 cur = NULL;
00075         }
00076         return ok;
00077 }
00078 bool
00079 MMLContentHandler::endElement(const QString &/*namespaceURI*/,
00080                 const QString &localName, const QString &/*qName*/) {
00081         if (debug) qDebug("endElement '%s'", (const char*)localName.toUtf8());
00082         bool valid;
00083         valid = cur->validate();
00084         if (!valid) {
00085                 err = QString("Tag '")+localName+"' is not valid: "
00086                         + qstring(cur->errorMsg());
00087         }
00088         cur = cur->parentNode();
00089         return valid;
00090 }
00091 bool
00092 MMLContentHandler::characters(const QString &ch) {
00093         if (debug) qDebug("characters: %s", (const char*)ch.toUtf8());
00094         bool valid = true;
00095         if (!ch.simplified().isEmpty()) {
00096                 MMLText *t;
00097                 MMLNode *n = cur->lastChild();
00098                 if (n && n->isText()) {
00099                         t = static_cast<MMLText *>(n);
00100                         t->appendData(domstring(ch));
00101                 } else {
00102                         t = doc->createTextNode(domstring(ch));
00103                         cur->appendChild(t);
00104                 }
00105                 valid = cur->validate();
00106                 if (!valid) {
00107                         err = qstring(cur->errorMsg());
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         return valid;
00111 }

00115         return true;

00122 bool
00123 MMLContentHandler::skippedEntity( const QString & name ) {
00124         if (debug) qDebug("skippedEntity: %s", (const char*)name.toUtf8());
00125         characters("&"+name+";");
00126         return true;
00127 }
